patterns: How can I password protect my device?
Different ways to set up a password
What is a primary way to secure my device
responses: You can password-protect your device with a complex password, PIN, or security pattern. When using a complex password please make sure its 12-14 characters long and includes a combination of numbers, ltteres, and symbols.

patterns: Can you help me secure my mobile device?
How can I secure my mobile device?
Ways to secure your mobile device?
responses: Here are some ways you can secure your mobile device: Set your phone to automatically lock after a few minutes of inactivity, enable remote wipe, and set your device to erase itself after repeated failed login attempts (for example, erase smartphone data after 10 failed login attempts).

patterns: Can you help me secure my device?
How can I improve security on my device?
How to secure device aside from passwords?
responses: Here are some security options: enable location applications, disable lock screen features and notifications, display emergency contact info on your lock screen, regulary check and install updates, and use antivirus software

patterns: What are some security threats to avoid?
responses: Some security threats to avoid are: rooting/jailbreaking your device, installing apps from unofficial sources, clicking on random links or pop-ups, and installing software from unknown sources.

patterns: What should I be aware of before installing an app?
How to tell if an app is legit
Should I download anything that isnâ€™t verified?
responses: Some app precautions you should do are: scrutinize and scan apps before installation, review the policies before installing a software, ensure the app isn't asking for permissions that are unnecessary, disable or uninstall apps you don't actively use, and sync and back up your data regularly.

patterns: How can I defend my data?
How can I protect my data
How can I secure my data
How can I defend my mobile data?
how can I safeguard my data?
How do I prevent my data from being leaked
Should I click on random links?
responses: You can safeguard your device's data by wiping data before selling or discarding it, reporting lost or stolen devices, being cautious with links received via text or email, avoiding phishing attempts by not opening unsolicited files or links, limiting personal data storage, encrypting regulated data, and disabling auto-login and auto-fill features.
